Header.title: Standing Strong with Educated Voices
Header.paragraph: Offering coaching support for recommendation letters, essays, and motivation letters, along with workshops to empower Afghanistan's youth.

About.paragraph: Given the challenges in Afghanistan, where the young generation faces a lack of proper education, soft skills, and access to trustworthy, well-trained scholarship advisors, there is a critical need for an agency to bridge this gap. Our mission is to address these needs through insightful and practical solutions.

Services.name: Coaching for Documents
Services.text: Provide personalized guidance for writing recommendation letters, essays, and motivation letters.

Services.name: Development Workshops
Services.text: Conduct workshops to enhance soft skills, leadership, and critical thinking.

Services.name: Scholarship Guidance
Services.text: Offer reliable support and mentorship for scholarship applications, from research to submission.

Services.name: Bridging Educational Gaps
Services.text: Address the lack of proper education by creating tailored programs to empower Afghanistan’s youth.

Services.name: Empowering Young Leaders
Services.text: Inspire and equip the young generation to become proactive leaders and changemakers.

Services.name: Community Building
Services.text: Build a network of educated and skilled individuals committed to contributing to Afghanistan’s future.

Features.title: Providing online boot camps
Features.text: To educate people with new knowledge and skills and lead positive changes in Afghanistan. Also help them to be ready for the job sectors.

Features.title: Scholarship registration services
Features.text: Providing support in filling up scholarship aplication and giving them instruction to do it by themselves.

Features.title: Coaching services
Features.text: Providing a period of coaching and a coach for students who wants to apply for scholarships in abroad.Coaches will help I  writing SOP, Motivation letter, cover letter, and essential essays for applying for scholarships.Students need to book a time and choose a coach based on the level of scholarship (Phd, Master, Bachelor, and high school) that they want to apply.

English.title: On Girl's Day, a Girl Was Shattered
English.excerpt: This deeply personal, true story recounts the crushing disappointment experienced by a Hazara girl on the day dedicated to celebrating girls in her homeland. Filled with initial excitement and hope, the narrator traveled to a certificate office believing she would finally receive a document representing twelve years of hard work—a critical step toward her future, possibly university.
English.author: Nazi Meisam

English.title: They hung love on the gallows
English.excerpt: The narrator, who struggles with sleepless nights and a feeling of "captivity" due to her homeland's crisis, recounts a crucial meeting with her friend, Liali, whom she affectionately called the "Einstein of my homeland" for her brilliance in math and ambition to become a doctor. The meeting takes place on September 13, 2023—the day university entrance exam results were announced in Afghanistan, a process that excluded all girls following the Taliban's takeover.
English.author: Nazi Meisam

English.title: The shadow that breathes
English.excerpt: Farkhunda's life after marriage becomes a cycle of domestic violence and terror inside a home that serves as her prison. Despite the brutality, she finds a flicker of desperate hope when she discovers she is pregnant. She believes the child, a daughter, could be her only path to a better future and a reason to fight. However, her husband is unmoved, and his violence only increases.
English.author: Various Authors

Dari.title: در روز دختر، دختری درهم شکست
Dari.excerpt: این داستان عمیقاً شخصی و واقعی، ناامیدی شدید یک دختر هزاره را در روزی که به بزرگداشت دختران در وطنش اختصاص داشت، روایت می‌کند. پر از هیجان و امید اولیه، راوی به دفتر گواهینامه سفر کرد با این باور که سرانجام سندی را دریافت خواهد کرد که نمایانگر دوازده سال کار سخت است - گامی حیاتی به سوی آینده‌اش، احتمالاً دانشگاه. با این حال، رویاهایش به طرز بی‌رحمی خرد شدند.
Dari.author: نازی میثم

Dari.title: روایتی در سکوت باد
Dari.excerpt: دختری در حال مبارزه، فریاد می‌زند در میان دردهایی که در گلویش گیر کرده‌اند—دردهایی که به گریه‌های خاموش و روح‌های فلج تبدیل شدند، اما هیچ کس متوجه نشد. عشق به دار آویخته شد. من می‌خواستم پزشک شوم، نه عروس! آن شب، وقتی خواب از گلوگاه شب فرود نیامد، قلبم به طرز عجیبی در غم‌ها گرفتار شد.
Dari.author: نازی میثم

Dari.title: سایه ای که نفس میکشد
Dari.excerpt: در اعماق ناامیدی، جایی که امید مانند خاطره‌ای دور به نظر می‌رسد، صداهای کسانی که خاموش شده‌اند برمی‌خیزند تا داستان‌هایشان را بگویند. این مجموعه روایات، نوری بر مبارزات، مقاومت و روح شکست‌ناپذیر کسانی می‌افکند که از فراموش شدن امتناع می‌ورزند. هر داستان گواهی است بر ظرفیت انسانی برای استقامت و قدرت حقیقت.
Dari.author: نویسندگان مختلف

Dari.title: دختری در تقلای فریاد
Dari.excerpt: در سرزمینی که رویاها به زندان تبدیل شده‌اند، دخترانی هستند که هنوز به آینده امید دارند. این داستان‌ها از مبارزه برای آموزش، آزادی و حق زندگی با عزت حکایت می‌کنند. هر کلمه فریادی است برای عدالت و هر جمله یادآوری است که انسانیت هرگز نمی‌میرد، حتی در تاریک‌ترین لحظات.
Dari.author: نویسندگان مختلف
